pullrequest.title: Logging Part 2: Inserting messages into a log file

content.raw:
Hypothetically, we could replace `Time` and `Console` with STL alternatives and then have the few integration tests depend on `ign-common` so they can use Filesystem (we would skip those tests if `ign-common` is unavailable).

I'm not saying this is a good idea, but it's an option, depending on how badly we want to minimize the dependency on `ign-common`.
content.html:
Hypothetically, we could replace Time and Console with STL alternatives and then have the few integration tests depend on ign-common so they can use Filesystem (we would skip those tests if ign-common is unavailable).

I'm not saying this is a good idea, but it's an option, depending on how badly we want to minimize the dependency on ign-common.
